name: arkitekto/math
description: PHP library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers

suggest.ext-bcmath: Install the BCMath (Binary Calculator) extension in order to speed up arbitrary precision integer arithmetic operations.
suggest.ext-gmp: Install the GMP (GNU Multiple Precision) extension in order to speed up arbitrary precision integer arithmetic operations. GMP seems to be faster than BCMath: http://phpseclib.sourceforge.net/math/intro.html
